    • Method Detail

      • applyToCourse

        void applyToCourse(int studentId,
                   int courseId)
            throws CourseNotFoundException,
                   CourseFullException
        calls DAO method to register student in registeredcourse
        Parameters:
        courseId - courseId to be applied
        studentId - studentId of the student that applies to course
        Throws:
        CourseNotFoundException - if courseId doesn't exist
        CourseFullException - if there are more then 10 students

      • dropCourse

        void dropCourse(int studentId,
                int courseId)
         throws CourseNotFoundException
        calls DAO method to remove student in registeredCourse
        Parameters:
        courseId - the courseId of what course is to be dropped
        studentId - the studentId that is dropping a course
        Throws:
        CourseNotFoundException - if courseId doesn't exist

      • viewAppliedCourses

        java.util.List<Course> viewAppliedCourses(int studentId)
        calls DAO method to view all courses student have applied
        Parameters:
        studentId - the studentId of the courses that he applied to
        Returns:
        a list of courses where the student is enrolled

      • makePayment

        void makePayment(int studentId,
                 int courseId)
          throws CourseNotFoundException
        calls DAO method to payFee
        Parameters:
        courseId - the courseId to pay the fee
        studentId - the student who is paying
        Throws:
        CourseNotFoundException - if courseId doesn't exist

      • checkGrades

        java.util.Map<Course,java.lang.Double> checkGrades(int studentId)
        calls DAO method to view grades for a student
        Parameters:
        studentId - the studentId that wants to check his grades
        Returns:
        Returns a map course to grade

      • viewUnpayedCourses

        java.util.List<Course> viewUnpayedCourses(int studentId)
                                   throws AllCoursesPaidException
        calls DAO method to view unpaid courses
        Parameters:
        studentId - the studentId that views the unpaid courses
        Returns:
        a list of courses to be paid
        Throws:
        AllCoursesPaidException - if all courses are already paid for

      • getStudentByUsername

        Student getStudentByUsername(java.lang.String username)
                      throws StudentNotFoundException
        gets a student by username
        Parameters:
        username - the user's username
        Returns:
        student the student object
        Throws:
        StudentNotFoundException - if student is not found

      • createStudent

        void createStudent(Student student)
            throws UsernameUsedException
        creates a student
        Parameters:
        student - the student to create
        Throws:
        UsernameUsedException - if user already exists
